Detailed Description

A divider bar that handles resize events and toggling automatically.

DzDynamicDivider is a class that takes two QWidget* objects and places a DzDividerBar between them. It handles resize events, as well as toggling of the divider bar if toggling is enabled.

For complex arrangements you can nest instances of this class by specifying them as one of the widgets via DzDynamicDividerWgt::setFirstWidget(QWidget *first) or DzDynamicDivider::setSecondWidget(QWidget *second)

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzDynamicDividerWgt::ResizeType

Specifies how widgets should be resized when this object is resized

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzDynamicDividerWgt::DzDynamicDividerWgt ( QWidget *  parent = 0,
const QString &  name = QString::null 
)

IMPORTANT: This constructor is here due to a dependency on making this available to scripting. If this constructor is used the instance will be in an undefined state until both DzDynamicDividerWgt::setFirstWidget(QWidget *first) and DzDynamicDivider::setSecondWidget(QWidget *second) are called.

Creates a new DzDynamicDividerWgt object with the following default values:

  • Qt::Orientation = Qt::Vertical
  • DzDividerBar::BarStyle = DzDividerBar::BSFull
  • DzDynamicDividerWgt::ResizeType = DzDynamicDividerWgt::StretchBoth

This object works best if both widgets have an appropriate minimumSizeHint method (reimplemented, if subclassed).

Parameters:
parent The parent of this object
name The name to use for this object

Parameters:

secondItem THe right (or bottom) widget of this object (should not be null)

Returns:
One of three values: DzDividerBar::WTLeftOrTop, DzDividerBar::WTRightOrBottom, or DzDividerBar::WTNone. The value determines which widget getPreferredWidgetExtent() refers to.

void DzDynamicDividerWgt::moveDivider ( int  distance  )  [slot]

Moves the divider distance pixels from the current location. If the new location will cause the divider to be displayed in an invalid location (based on minimum size requirements of the widgets), it will be moved and displayed as close as possible to the desired location.

Parameters:
distance The distance in pixels from the current location.

Parameters:

void DzDynamicDividerWgt::setPreferredDividerPercent ( double  percentage  ) 

Sets the position of the divider bar. If the new location will cause the divider bar to be displayed in an invalud location (based on minimum size requirements of the widgets), it will be moved and displayed as close as possible to the desired location

Parameters:
percentage The location of the divider bar as a percentage. The value should be between 0 and 1, with a value of 0.5 representing 50%. 0 will be used for values less than or equal to 0 and 1 will be used for values greater than or equal to 1.
void DzDynamicDividerWgt::setPreferredWidgetExtent ( DzDividerBar::WidgetType  widget,
int  extent 
) [slot]

Sets the preferred extent (width or height depending on orientation) for the specified widget. If this extent cannot be used (usually due to minimum size constraints) then the divider will be positioned as close as possible to the preferred extent.

Parameters:
widget The widget that should be sized. Values other than DzDividerBar::WTLeftOrTop or DzDividerBar::WTRightOrBottom will cause this method to have no effect.
extent The extent to be set for the widget
void DzDynamicDividerWgt::setResizeType ( ResizeType  type  ) 

Sets the resizeType for this object

Parameters:
type The desired method of resizing the widgets

Sets the right (or bottom) widget, depending on the orientation

Parameters:
second The widget to be used in the right (or bottom) position. This should not be null!

Sets the spacing between the widgets and the divider bar

Parameters:
spacing The spacing to be used for this object
void DzDynamicDividerWgt::setToggleDirection ( DzDividerBar::WidgetType  toggleDir  ) 

Sets which direction to toggle the divider bar

Parameters:
toggleDir The direction the divider bar is toggled/minimized when clicked. If toggleDir equals DzDividerBar::WTNone then toggling is disabled.
void DzDynamicDividerWgt::setToggleState ( bool  minimized  )  [slot]

Toggles the widget to the specified minimized state, if needed.

Parameters:
minimized Whether the divider should be minimized or not.
void DzDynamicDividerWgt::toggleWidget (  )  [slot]

Toggles the widget specified by a call to enableToggleBar. If toggling is disabled, this method has no effect. If either the first or second widget is null, this method will also have no effect.
